channel.title: CTP on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: ctp exchange lab javascript runtime error
item.description:
Knowledge Base Article - CTAC (Communications Training Analysis Corporation)  
=================================================

Subject: CTP Exchange Lab Deployment Error Could not find a JavaScript runtime

Revision History:
    2015-02-20 08:24:52 - Version 1 created by Paul Rigor

Details: (include steps to reproduce, symptoms, corrective actions, contact information, links and a any other helpful information)

If you get the below error, you need nodejs installed.  apt-get install nodejs.

F, [2015-02-20T16:21:07.967647 #15635] FATAL -- :
ActionView::Template::Error (Could not find a JavaScript runtime. See https://github.com/sstephenson/execjs for a list of available runtimes.
  (in /appdata/ctp_exchange_lab/releases/20150220161336/app/assets/javascripts/application.js)):
    93:
    94:     <%= render partial: "layouts/footer" %>
    95:
    96:     <%= javascript_include_tag 'application' %>
    97:     <script type="text/javascript" src="//s7.addthis.com/js/300/addthis_widget.js#pubid=ra-5424265107e738a0&domready=1"></script>
    98:
    99:     <%= render partial: "content_items/checkout_handlebars" %>
  app/views/layouts/application.html.erb:96:in `_app_views_layouts_application_html_erb___1952985711913696268_39735280'
  /appdata/.rvm/rubies/ruby-2.1.1/lib/ruby/2.1.0/benchmark.rb:294:in `realtime'
  /appdata/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.1.1@ctp_exchange_lab/bin/unicorn:23:in `load'
  /appdata/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.1.1@ctp_exchange_lab/bin/unicorn:23:in `<main>'
  /appdata/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.1.1@ctp_exchange_lab/bin/ruby_executable_hooks:15:in `eval'
  /appdata/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.1.1@ctp_exchange_lab/bin/ruby_executable_hooks:15:in `<main>'

nodejs has been installed on r-public-as-05 and r-public-as-06 on 02-20-2015 for CS-1906 (HHS)

=================================================
This document is proprietary and confidential. No part of this document may be 
disclosed in any manner to a third party without the prior written consent of 
CTAC.```
